Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20045365 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Sushi Mambo, Inc., to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 255 Bleeker Street, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 2.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
